io.aesy.datasize.format

Class SimpleDataSizeFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.aesy.datasize.format.SimpleDataSizeFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSizeFormatter

    public class SimpleDataSizeFormatter
extends Object
implements DataSizeFormatter
    A SimpleDataSizeFormatter formats DataSize objects.

    The formatted output produced by this implementation is a simple representation of the object similar to that produced by DataSize#toString, except more configurable. Locale and precision can be configured. The precision determines the maximum amount of fraction digits shown in the output. The value is rounded using a RoundingMode.HALF_UP rounding mode. The unit will be formatted as its' abbreviation with a space between the value and the unit.

    If no locale is provided, Locale.getDefault(Locale.Category.FORMAT) is used. If no precision is provided, a maximum count of 2 decimals is used.

    Example usage: 
    
 DataSize dataSize = DataSize.of(Math.PI, ByteUnits.SI.KILOBYTE);
 String formatted = new SimpleDataSizeFormatter(Locale.US, 2).format(dataSize);

 assertEquals(formatted, "3.14 kB");
    See Also:
    DataSize.toString(), RoundingMode.HALF_UP

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleDataSizeFormatter()
      Creates a SimpleDataSizeFormatter with Locale.getDefault(Locale.Category.FORMAT) and a default precision of 2.
      SimpleDataSizeFormatter(int precision)
      Creates a SimpleDataSizeFormatter with Locale.getDefault(Locale.Category.FORMAT) and the desired precision.
      SimpleDataSizeFormatter(Locale locale)
      Creates a SimpleDataSizeFormatter with the desired locale and a default precision of 2.
      SimpleDataSizeFormatter(Locale locale, int precision)
      Creates a SimpleDataSizeFormatter with the desired locale and precision.

      • SimpleDataSizeFormatter

        public SimpleDataSizeFormatter(int precision)
        Creates a SimpleDataSizeFormatter with Locale.getDefault(Locale.Category.FORMAT) and the desired precision. If precision is less than zero, not rounding will be performed.
        Parameters:
        precision - The precision to use

    • Method Detail

      • format

        public String format(DataSize dataSize)
        Formats a DataSize object to produce a string based on the set locale and precision.

        The value is rounded using a RoundingMode.HALF_UP rounding mode and the unit will be formatted as its' abbreviation with a space between the value and the unit.

        Specified by:
        format in interface DataSizeFormatter
        Parameters:
        dataSize - The DataSize to format
        Returns:
        The formatted DataSize string
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the dataSize object is null
